mil5.3.9:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil5.3.9:1.1_0: “When the Buddha spoke like this, he said,
mil5.3.9:1.2_0: they’re an ascetic because of the ending of defilements.
mil5.3.9:1.3_0: And he had spoken to him.
mil5.3.9:2.2_0: For you call the ascetic life!’
mil5.3.9:3.1_0: There are four things that keep them safe and sound, and enjoyment.
mil5.3.9:3.3_0: If you’re lost by the ending of defilements, that don’t have even an ascetic.
mil5.3.9:3.4_0: But if you have a discrimination, you must acknowledge it.”
mil5.3.9:4.1_0: “Great king, the Buddha has spoken of the defilements.
mil5.3.9:4.2_0: And he had spoken to him.
mil5.3.9:4.3_0: ‘First teachers have an ascetic, not a brahmin.’
mil5.3.9:4.4_0: The Buddha said, “Great king, this is the consequence of those people.
mil5.3.9:4.5_0: ‘Nothing an absolute present to them, not an ascetic, not a true ascetic. For this is called “Realized One”.
mil5.3.9:5.1_0: Of all the defilements that might be practicing for an ascetic, all of them is said to be the best of them all.
mil5.3.9:5.2_0: The flowers of flax, jackal flowers, with flowers is said to be the best kind of flowers all fruits, and many kinds of flowers. And the flowers of flatulence is said to be the best kind of rain.
mil5.3.9:5.3_0: In the same way, all the defilements of sensuality is practicing for you to be the best of them all.
mil5.3.9:6.1_0: Whether all is said to be the best of all fine rice, the crooked sal trees is said to be the foremost of them all.
mil5.3.9:6.2_0: In the same way, all the defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance have ended all defilements.”
mil5.3.9:6.3_0: “It’s good, Sir, that you should repeat what I have said.”
mil5.3.9:7.1_0: The ninth sub-chapter on the best.
